reviews.reviewText: Ivan was incredible!  What looked like it should be an easy task ended up being alot more complicated.  After attempting a variety of options, he settled on the best one to achieve my request.  He was fantastic.  I highly recommend Ivan.  If I need anything in the future, I will request Ivan.  Thank you Ivan!

reviews.name: Pat Mills
reviews.reviewText: AWESOME AWESOME........ Jacob & Delta Plumbing are 5 star plus in my book.   We had a serious plumbing and called Delta and they were here very quickly since it was an emergency and we didn't want out brand new floor and bathroom ruined because of the back up that was caused from 64 year old cast iorn pipes rusting and breaking apart.    They were here 2 days assessing the job, was here early in the day Wednesday and started the job.  Every piece of dirt was put back into place.....lol .......and the made special care of not tearing up a new baby tree that had just been planted recently.  They doubled checked the water to make sure it was running threw the new pipes properly, had me run water threw the washing machine several times so that everything was flowing correctly and not backing up again.  The speediness and care they gave me was top notch.  Everything they had to do or needed to do they told me first and asked if i wanted to do it and yes we did it.  And I couldn't be happier.  In the past we have used several different plumbers but no one has ever taken the time to explain everything to us and give us the option as to what we wanted to do, and give me the respect I deserve being that its our house and our money.  No pressure or pushing us into a decision we needed to think about it and go over with him on.   I totally recommend Delta Plumbing for any and all plumbing problems they would be the one's I'd call and "will" call.  Thank you Jacob for your help, your kindness and concern of what could have happened in the very near future had we not had all those pipes replaced.  Thank you Delta

reviews.reviewText:
I'm reviewing the plumbing service I received from Mike's Plumbing and Electric.  They were dispatched via my home warranty company.  They responded quickly to my issue, showed up on time, and called me when they were enroute.  The technician was polite, courteous, and took the time to let me walk him through the issue we were having with our bathtub.  He fixed the problem promptly and even gave me a few pointers to help me prevent similar issues in the future.

I've seen a few bad reviews from people based on their "home warranty" and their repair not being covered.  Whether you dispatch a plumber, electrician, or AC specialist, they can only cover items that your home warranty company lets them cover, based on your contract (that you picked).  People should read their contracts first before taking their frustrations out on a local business.  Cheaper home warranties cover less items, go figure.

This was the one big aggravating factor. Other than that, there's only a few more things I'd suggest. Buy Booties that you can pull over your shoes. Discovered my septic system was backing up on Saturday and called Mr Paton and he said he could be at my house at 7 AM on Sunday to pump my tank. Arrived on time and completed cleaning out my septic system and a short time at a fair price especially for a Sunday service call.
Very professional and knowledgeable of his business.
I would highly recommend him and will use him in the future if needed.

reviews.name: Gilbert Gildersleeve
reviews.reviewText: Payton's Septic is super professional,  courteous and his prices are extremely reasonable. He will undoubtedly be your best choice for your septic needs.

reviews.name: melisa courtney
reviews.reviewText: Great experience! He arrived when he said he would and was very professional. He took his time to make sure our tank was emptied thoroughly. It was apparent they really care about the quality of their work. Would highly recommend!

reviews.name: Jeff G
reviews.reviewText:
At 3:30 pm on a Thursday afternoon I noticed my yard had sewage water bubbling from where my septic tank is. I called Mr. Payton and explained what I saw and that I needed to get it pumped ASAP due to having a party the next day. After a full day's schedule Mr. Payton and crew showed up at 7:00 pm pumped and inspected my system.
Payton's have my business from here on out.

reviews.name: Holly Jones
reviews.reviewText: Payton's Septic Services is TOP NOTCH!   Mr. Payton and his crew are professionals of the highest quality.  They showed up right on time, did a fantastic job on our septic tank and the price we were quoted was the price we paid!   My husband and I HIGHLY recommend calling Payton's Septic Services!  We are Payton's Septic Services customers for life and i guarantee you and your family will be too!

reviews.name: Monica
reviews.reviewText: Fast, friendly and efficient service. My family home needed some repair work to our outdoor pond and sprinkler system. We were able to get everything fixed in one afternoon. We definitely recommend!

reviews.name: Cathy Schneider
reviews.reviewText: Called Monday schedule for Wednesday arrived on time. Mr. Michael was super professional and informative. The price was the best in town. Definitely will use them again and refer my friends and family.

reviews.name: Judy Davis
reviews.reviewText: Great service and friendly folks! I would definitely recommend Royal Flush!

reviews.name: Diane Stemen
reviews.reviewText: I called Royal Flush to clean out our septic and they did a wonderful job. They were very friendly and professional. I would recommend them to everyone.

reviews.name: Pamela Grant
reviews.reviewText: Love them! They went above and beyond to get the job done! 100% satisfaction!

reviews.name: Dylan Munnerlyn
reviews.reviewText: 2nd time customer. They are on time type of people which is always appreciated. Serviced our system pretty quick and packed everything back down. The most reasonable prices out there with quality work.  10/10 Good folks

reviews.name: RoyalWill1
reviews.reviewText: Great Service!! We had an 8:00 appt. We received a call stating they were on their way. They arrived on time and were very professional. The job was completed in a professional and timely manner. If/when we have our tank serviced again we will definitely be calling them.

reviews.name: Drew Malinowski
reviews.reviewText:
First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

reviews.name: Michael Gilbert
reviews.reviewText: This company you can rely on. Called and they kindly added us to the daily schedule. Mike doesn't any $#!+ behind, (pun intended). This is the only company that we have called on over the 17 years we have been here! Grade A $#!+ crew.

reviews.name: Pat Frazier
reviews.reviewText: Very professional and honest company. I would recommend them !

reviews.name: Toni Gilliam
reviews.reviewText:
They came and did a job on my septic tank, I was very happy with their work, today when I needed service by a plumber, their referral did the job the same day and I would use him again.
Thanks again to the people at Royal Flush.

reviews.name: John Carter
reviews.reviewText: We moved in several years ago (2018 to be exact) and were told our system had been cleaned - like other things with this home, it had not been done properly. Royal Flush came early in the morning, cleaned it properly and thoroughly, and left - they made it it look easy (knowing full good and well that it is a thankless task). I am very pleased. Thank you, Royal Flush!

reviews.reviewText: These guys were friendly and they did an exceptional job and took time to explain what the problem was. I felt so relieved to know that when they were done, my problem was solved.  If ever needed, I?m calling them again and I recommend them to anyone as well.

Customer service that goes beyond their specific area of expertise is not something you find often, but it is truly appreciated!

reviews.reviewText: They are fast, personable and professional. They also, recommended and installed Tank Risers for easy maintenance in the future.

reviews.name: Kelly T
reviews.reviewText: 5 Star they always find the source of the problem. Over 10 years I have had 2 issues with my septic pump. The first problem everyone told me I needed a new pump and It couldn't  be repaired. M & M came out and repaired the pump because it just had something wrapped up in the pump saving me hundreds. The next issue, others said we needed a new pump and I called M & M they came out and found my breaker went bad. I will never call another when I have an issue again. They are the most honest, always professional and polite, get to the root of the problem, and find the best solution saving home owners money.

reviews.reviewText: Next day service (at least in my case) with competitive service rates, professional/courteous staff. Would not hesitate to call them again if needed.

reviews.name: Jeff Johnson
reviews.reviewText: I called first thing Monday morning and inquired about having my tank pumped. They called me back 2 hours later and said they were on there way. They beat me to the house and I only had a 20 minute drive. Eric located the tank and was able to dig it up, empty it and re-cover in 90 minutes. He was very polite and had a good joking personality. A lady called me about an hour later and took a my payment over the phone. I can recommend them!

reviews.name: Jennifer mulack
reviews.reviewText: Eric was prompt, courteous, and knowledgeable. Less than 3 hours between calling and them being on scene. Recommending to others!

reviews.reviewText: Awesome experience. Came to my house on time and my septic system was able to be repaired by night fall.

reviews.name: Christina Siwko
reviews.reviewText: When our septic tank backed up into our house we called multiple companies for an emergency call. By the time I found Ikard I was just praying for someone  to answer the phone and be able to come quickly. Not only did I get a person on the phone they were great they were able to get us on the schedule  the following morning.  The guys who came to the house were polite and got right to work. They cleaned up the yard nicely as well. We will definitely use this company again.

reviews.name: raz ar
reviews.reviewText: I want to Ikard for the work performed on my field line recently. Most importantly,? I appreciate the integrity displayed doing the job that was needed instead of doing the job at a higher price for an effort not necessary.? Others may have chosen the higher priced-unneeded work. They chose to do the right thing while saving me a significant amount of money in the process.

reviews.name: tldavis36
reviews.reviewText: I?ve used Ikard?s throughout my 20 years in my house, to clean my septic tank. I?ve never had any issues. Just had it cleaned again yesterday. Employees are friendly and courteous. Will use again!

reviews.reviewText: Ikard came out to pump our septic tank today.  The technician was polite and professional.  We will call them again when it's time.

reviews.name: teresa wilbourn
reviews.reviewText:
Great company! Came the same day that we called.
Very friendly people.

reviews.name: Mallory Mitchell
reviews.reviewText: They answered the phone quickly and immediately came out! The service was quick and very professional!

reviews.name: JDR (EntoMan)
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely phenomenal service. I called, got a fair price, and less than 3 hours later, my septic was cleaned out and everything was flowing again. Can't beat that! The two techs that came out were very professional, knowledgeable, and friendly. Couple of genuinely good guys. They didn't mind me watching (it was legit cool to watch), and asking questions, always taking the time to answer any questions and give me solid advice on taking care of the septic system. They were able to raise and lower the concrete septic lid with a feather touch using the backhoe (impressive!) and cleaned everything up nicely. And the price I was quoted on the phone was exactly what I paid, not a penny more. I had always heard horror stories about septic service and dreaded the day, but with the excellent price and awesome service, Ikard Septic made it a breeze. Call these guys first when you need septic service. I highly recommend them!!

reviews.name: Edward Troupe
reviews.reviewText: Pricing a job coming up. Good prices.

Price was given and that's what I paid- nothing more.  Professional, Polite and in my opinion AWESOME!  Thanks Guys!!!

reviews.reviewText: Clayton was excellent!!  After trying to get my the company who installed my septic to come out and check my alarm to no avail, I started looking for other companies.  No one wanted to come tackle something they weren't sure of except Clayton.  Not only did he come within an hour of receiving my call, but he fixed everything AND gave my system a complete check!!  Clayton was awesome and has won my business from here on out.  Don't hesitate to call, they are one of the good guys!!
